chat_history.content:
Hello! I'm here to help you with your situation. Let's begin with:  
*Explain to me what happened to you?**

Hey there, I really need some legal advice. I was in a bad car accident last Tuesday evening around 6 PM. It happened at the intersection of 5th Avenue and Market Street. I was driving home from work when this guy in a red pickup truck ran a stop sign and slammed right into the driver's side of my car. It was a really hard hit, and my car ended up spinning and crashing into a nearby tree.
I'm sorry to hear about the accident. Can you tell me what kind of consequences you're facing now because of this situation?
I broke my foot you see and I'm the provider of my family. I have a physcial job so I can't work at all. This puts me into alot of pressure
I understand this must be a challenging time for you. To assist you further, could you tell me when you initiated the legal case related to your accident?
No I haven't started a legal case yet,
